verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to those who prophesy <S%H5030><s%> out of their own heart, <S%H3820><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the foolish <S%H5036><s%> prophets, <S%H5030><s%> who follow <S%H1980><s%> their own spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and have seen nothing! <S%H7200><s%>
Israel, <S%H3478><s%> your prophets <S%H5030><s%> have been like foxes <S%H7776><s%> in the waste places. <S%H2723><s%>

You have not gone up <S%H5927><s%> into the gaps, <S%H6556><s%> neither built up <S%H1443><s%> the wall <S%H1447><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

They have seen <S%H2372><s%> falsehood <S%H7723><s%> and lying <S%H3577><s%> divination, <S%H7081><s%> who say, <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> says; <S%H559><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has not sent <S%H7971><s%> them: <S%H3176><s%> and they have made men to hope that the word <S%H1697><s%> would be confirmed. <S%H6965><s%>

Haven't <S%H2372><s%> you seen a false <S%H7723><s%> vision, <S%H4236><s%> and haven't <S%H1696><s%> you spoken a lying <S%H7723><s%> divination, <S%H4738><s%> in that you say, <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> says; <S%H5002><s%> but I have not spoken? <S%H559><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Because you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> falsehood, <S%H7723><s%> and seen <S%H2372><s%> lies, <S%H3577><s%> therefore, <S%H5002><s%> behold, I am against you, says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

My hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be against the prophets <S%H5030><s%> who see <S%H2374><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> visions, <S%H7080><s%> and who divine lies: <S%H3577><s%> they shall not be in the council <S%H5475><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> neither shall they be written <S%H3789><s%> in the writing <S%H3791><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> neither shall they enter <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

Because, <S%H2937><s%> even because they have seduced my people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Peace; <S%H7965><s%> and there is no peace; <S%H7965><s%> and when one builds up <S%H1129><s%> a wall, <S%H2434><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> they plaster <S%H2902><s%> it with whitewash: <S%H8602><s%>

tell <S%H559><s%> those who plaster <S%H2902><s%> it with whitewash, <S%H8602><s%> that it shall fall: <S%H5307><s%> there shall be an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> shower; <S%H1653><s%> and you, <S%H859><s%> great hailstones, <S%H417><s%> shall fall; <S%H5307><s%> and a stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> shall tear it. <S%H1234><s%>
Behold, <S%H7023><s%> when the wall has fallen, <S%H5307><s%> shall it not be said <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H2915><s%> Where is the plaster with which you have plastered it? <S%H2902><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> I will even tear <S%H1234><s%> it with a stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> in my wrath; <S%H2534><s%> and there shall be an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> shower <S%H1653><s%> in my anger, <S%H639><s%> and great hailstones <S%H417><s%> in wrath <S%H2534><s%> to consume it. <S%H3617><s%>

So will I break down <S%H2040><s%> the wall <S%H7023><s%> that you have plastered <S%H2902><s%> with whitewash, <S%H8602><s%> and bring <S%H5060><s%> it down to the ground, <S%H776><s%> so that its foundation <S%H3247><s%> shall be uncovered; <S%H1540><s%> and it shall fall, <S%H5307><s%> and you shall be consumed <S%H3615><s%> in its midst: <S%H8432><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus will I accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> on the wall, <S%H7023><s%> and on those who have plastered <S%H2902><s%> it with whitewash; <S%H8602><s%> and I will tell <S%H559><s%> you, <S%H7023><s%> The wall is no more, <S%H2902><s%> neither those who plastered it;

to wit, <S%H5030><s%> the prophets of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who prophesy <S%H5012><s%> concerning Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and who see <S%H2374><s%> visions <S%H2377><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> for her, <S%H7965><s%> and there is no peace, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

You, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> against the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of your people, <S%H5971><s%> who prophesy <S%H5012><s%> out of their own heart; <S%H3820><s%> and prophesy against them, <S%H5012><s%>

and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the women who sew <S%H8609><s%> pillows <S%H3704><s%> on all elbows, <S%H679><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> kerchiefs <S%H4555><s%> for the head <S%H7218><s%> of persons of every stature <S%H6967><s%> to hunt <S%H6679><s%> souls! <S%H5315><s%> Will you hunt <S%H6679><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> and save <S%H2421><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%> alive for yourselves? <S%H2421><s%>

You have profaned <S%H2490><s%> me among my people <S%H5971><s%> for handfuls <S%H8168><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> and for pieces <S%H6595><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> who should not die, <S%H4191><s%> and to save <S%H2421><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> who should not live, <S%H2421><s%> by your lying <S%H3576><s%> to my people <S%H5971><s%> who listen <S%H8085><s%> to lies. <S%H3577><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Behold, <S%H3704><s%> I am against your pillows, with which you <S%H859><s%> there hunt <S%H6679><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> to make them fly, <S%H6524><s%> and I will tear <S%H7167><s%> them from your arms; <S%H2220><s%> and I will let the souls <S%H5315><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> even the souls <S%H5315><s%> whom you hunt <S%H6679><s%> to make them fly. <S%H6524><s%>

Your kerchiefs <S%H4555><s%> also will I tear, <S%H7167><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> out of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and they shall be no more in your hand <S%H3027><s%> to be hunted; <S%H4686><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Because with lies <S%H8267><s%> you have grieved <S%H3512><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> whom I have not made sad; <S%H3512><s%> and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7451><s%> that he should not return <S%H7725><s%> from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and be saved alive: <S%H2421><s%>

Therefore you shall no more see <S%H2372><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> visions, <S%H7080><s%> nor practice divination. <S%H7081><s%> I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> out of your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
